sentences.sentence: Leon Sullivan was my mentor and my friend.
sentences.translation: 利昂·沙利文既是我的导师，也是我的朋友。

sentences.sentence: Eventually, he was excommunicated along with his mentor.
sentences.translation: 最终，他与他的导师一起被革出教门。

sentences.sentence: So, over the fierce objections of his mentor Hofmann, he left college to give birth to the modern chemical industry.
sentences.translation: 于是，不顾他的导师霍夫曼的强烈反对，他离开了大学，创立了现代化学工业。
